name: Sand Stream
summary: Summons Sandstorm for 5 turns (8 if the user is holding a Smooth Rock). If a Pokémon with Sand Stream is sent out at the same time as a Pokémon with a different weather-summoning ability (Drizzle, Drought, or Snow Warning), the Pokémon with the slower Speed will have its weather activated.
viability: Sand Stream works very similar to Drizzle, and is thus quite as good. Tyranitar and Hippowdon can make good use of their bulk and become a special wall (Tyranitar), due to the increased Special Defense that Sandstorm brings out.
